`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`

#### <s class="topic-title">[[Caffeine]]</s>

Stimulant present in [[tea]], coffee, cola beverages, analgesic [[drugs]], and agents used to increase alertness.

**See**::
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
